article_title: UK working to find answers, says Foreign Secretary.
sentence: "British  Nationals  are  reported  to  have  been  killed,  we  are  urgently  working  to  verify  this  information  and  will  provide  full  support  to  their  families,"  he  said.

article_title: UK working to find answers, says Foreign Secretary.
sentence: World  Central  Kitchen  said  a  number  of  nationalities  were  among  the  dead  -  including  from  the  UK.
